tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE unauthorized_access_attempts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE unauthorized_access_attempts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INTEGER,
    user_id INTEGER,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT,
    device_type TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    owner_id INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    password TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    role TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    access_result VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE access_attempts (
  attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  attempt_date TIMESTAMP,
  success BOOLEAN
);
